Thank you for contributing to [SPEC NAME GOES HERE]. Please describe the change
you are making and complete the checklist below. If your change is purely
editorial, please reflect that in the PR's title by prefixing it with
"`[Editorial]: `". If your change affects normative text, then please fill out
the checklist below.

If you think your PR is ready to land, please verify that the checklist below is
filled out, and that the PR builds successfully before pinging the spec's
editors.
-->

- [ ] At least two implementers are interested (and none opposed):
   * … <!-- If available, link to relevant discussion and/or official standards positions -->
   * …
- [ ] [Tests](https://github.com/web-platform-tests/wpt) are written and can be reviewed and commented upon at:
   * … <!-- If these tests are tentative, link a PR to make them non-tentative. -->
- [ ] Implementation bugs are filed:
   * Chromium: …            <!-- https://crbug.com/new -->
   * Gecko: …               <!-- https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/enter_bug.cgi?product=Core&component=DOM%3A%20Security -->
   * WebKit: …              <!-- https://bugs.webkit.org/enter_bug.cgi -->
- [ ] MDN issue is filed: … <!-- https://github.com/mdn/content/issues/new/choose -->
- [ ] The top of this PR includes a clear commit message to use.

(See our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/mikewest/webappec-templates/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md) for more details
